title: Introduction to Apache Cassandra
description:
Session Details:
Learn the fundamental NoSQL concepts with Apache Cassandra‚Ñ¢
Discover what NoSQL is and what it can do
Get hands-on with NoSQL data modeling concepts
Set up your own NoSQL database using AstraDB - no installation required
--
This online introductory workshop is perfect for those coming from a relational background and wanting to get hands-on with a database that has no tables, rows, primary keys, or foreign keys.
If you‚Äôre new to the world of NoSQL and haven‚Äôt used Cassandra before, you can expect to leave our 2 hour introductory session with your own database running in the cloud along with an understanding of data modeling principles.

And much more!

üìö To access the learning materials, use the GitHub link below:
https://github.com/datastaxdevs/workshop-intro-to-cassandra

‚òÅÔ∏èTo create your very first NoSQL database, use the link below:
https://astra.dev/3-9

üí°Get help throughout using our Discord server:
Join our Discord here - https://discord.gg/UEBDeBq

‚úÖ Sign up for more workshops below:
https://www.datastax.com/workshops

üöÄ üöÄ ENJOY !! üöÄ üöÄ
